description:
The objective of this module is to develop the learning capabilities and hone the problem solving skills of talented students at a mathematically deeper and more rigorous level. The contents of this module will consist of those in the regular module (MA3111 Complex Analysis I) and the following additional topics: Casorati-Weierstrass Theorem, 
infinite products of analytic functions, normal families of

analytic functions.
title: Complex Analysis I (S)
prerequisite: (MA1507 or MA2104) and (MA2108 or MA2108S) and departmental approval
